name: Carousel
description:
This is a game full of beautiful women. Pictures of scantily dressed beauties waiting for you to unlock!!!

A unique jigsaw puzzle where each level cuts a beautiful image into 16 regular hexagonal pieces. Each hexagon fragment can be moved freely by mouse drag, can also be rotated by mouse wheel, players need to put these fragments in the right Angle in the right position, restore the complete image is a successful pass, each pass will unlock this beautiful picture in the gallery.

The challenge lies in the rotating nature of the hexagon, which requires the player to use spatial imagination and creativity to carefully observe the connections between the pieces and find the right way to join them. Each hexagon has multiple possible directions, and players need to experiment to find the best combination of splices.
